case.state: This is a private thing between friends. Of course, since you just watched me pleasure myself, friends we must be now, right?
Mm... it is fun to be watched!
Who's next? Come now! Oh-- teeheheheh. I guess that is what you call the literal definition, yes?

~cards~. This club is called a lorgfahhhs on Tamaran. May your lorgfahhhs glimmer!

I am having the best hand!

This hand can be quite a mystery... but I am quite happy either way it goes!

I suppose I should start preparing. What should I take off?

Now I can remove my boots.

...But for now, I think I will keep playing to win! Behold, my gloves!
I thought about this quite a lot! If I took off my boots, you would see my panties. See?
They're quite stretchy! I often use them in place of pockets on the pants.

...I see. But are we not having the "Girl's Bonding Moment?"
